name: Tower Defingers
description:
Help Pinkie, Ringer, Bird, and Laser-P set up their defenses against waves of Knuckledraggers.

How to Play

  • Select finger to build with mouse or keyboard.
    • Build cost and keyboard shortcut are shown in bottom bar.
  • Click a build location, indicated by yellow circle. 
    • Pinkie can be built anywhere. 
    • All other fingers must be built adjacent to the finger that comes before it.
  • The game is over if too many enemies get to the end.
  • Complete 6 waves to win!
